author: Will Canny
title: Today's Corporate Bitcoin Holders Could be Tomorrow's Forced Sellers: StanChart
description: Sixty-one corporate treasuries now hold a combined 3.2% of the total bitcoin supply.
content:
Corporate bitcoin 
 treasuries are adding to buying pressure at the moment, but a sharp drop in the price of the world's cryptocurrency could lead to forced liquidations, Standard Chartered analyst … [+1217 chars]
